TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TResult Func<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4,out TResult>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4);
.class public auto ansi sealed Func`5<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, + TResult> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Func(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, Out TResult)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4) As TResult
generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename TResult> public delegate TResult Func(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4);

typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第一个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第二个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T3
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第三个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: T4
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的第四个参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the fourth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 此委托封装的方法的返回值类型。

span.span: The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg1
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第一个参数。

span.span: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg2
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第二个参数。

span.span: The second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg3
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第三个参数。

span.span: The third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

param.name: arg4
param.span: 此委托封装的方法的第四个参数。

span.span: The fourth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封装一个具有四个参数并返回 参数指定的类型值的方法。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has four parameters and returns a value of the type specified by the parameter.

returns.span: 此委托封装的方法的返回值。

span.span: The return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此委托来表示可以作为参数传递而不用显式声明自定义委托的方法。You can use this delegate to represent a method that can be passed as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封装的方法必须对应于此委托定义方法签名。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 这意味着，封装的方法必须具有四个参数，其中每个通过值传递给它，并且它必须返回一个值。This means that the encapsulated method must have four parameters, each of which is passed to it by value, and that it must return a value. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用的方法具有四个参数并返回`void`(或在 Visual Basic 中，声明为`Sub`而不是`Function`)，使用泛型委托。To reference a method that has four parameters and returns `void` (or in Visual Basic, that is declared as a `Sub` rather than as a `Function`), use the generic delegate instead. 当你使用委托，则不需要显式定义委托，用于封装具有四个参数的方法。When you use the delegate, you do not have to explicitly define a delegate that encapsulates a method with four parameters. 例如，下面的代码显式声明一个名为的泛型委托`Searcher`并将分配到的引用给其委托实例的方法。For example, the following code explicitly declares a generic delegate named `Searcher` and assigns a reference to the method to its delegate instance. [!code-csharp[System.Func~5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~5/cs/Delegate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Func~5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~5/vb/Delegate.vb#1)] 下面的示例简化了此代码实例化而不是显式定义新的委托，并向其分配指定的方法的委托。The following example simplifies this code by instantiating the delegate instead of explicitly defining a new delegate and assigning a named method to it. [!code-csharp[System.Func~5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~5/cs/Func5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Func~5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~5/vb/Func5.vb#2)] 你可以使用委托与 C# 中的匿名方法，如下面的示例所示。You can use the delegate with anonymous methods in C#, as the following example illustrates. (有关匿名方法的简介，请参阅[匿名方法](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md)。)(For an introduction to anonymous methods, see [Anonymous Methods](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/anonymous-methods.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Func~5#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~5/cs/Anon.cs#3)] 你还可以分配到 lambda 表达式委托，如下面的示例所示。You can also assign a lambda expression to a delegate, as the following example illustrates. (有关 lambda 表达式的简介，请参阅[Lambda 表达式](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/lambda-expressions.md)和[Lambda 表达式](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md)。)(For an introduction to lambda expressions, see [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/lambda-expressions.md) and [Lambda Expressions](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/lambda-expressions.md).) [!code-csharp[System.Func~5#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~5/cs/Lambda.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Func~5#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~5/vb/Lambda.vb#4)] Lambda 表达式的基础类型是一个泛型`Func`委托。The underlying type of a lambda expression is one of the generic `Func` delegates. 这使它可以将 lambda 表达式作为参数传递而不显式将其分配给委托。This makes it possible to pass a lambda expression as a parameter without explicitly assigning it to a delegate. 具体而言，因为许多方法中的类型命名空间具有`Func`参数，你可以将传递这些方法的 lambda 表达式而不显式实例化`Func`委托。In particular, because many methods of types in the namespace have `Func` parameters, you can pass these methods a lambda expression without explicitly instantiating a `Func` delegate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何声明和使用委托。The following example demonstrates how to declare and use a delegate. 此示例声明变量并将其分配采用的 lambda 表达式值和作为参数的值。This example declares a variable and assigns it a lambda expression that takes a value and an value as parameters. Lambda 表达式返回`true`如果的长度参数等于的值参数。The lambda expression returns `true` if the length of the parameter is equal to the value of the parameter. 委托，用于封装此方法随后在对数组的字符串中的筛选器字符串的查询中使用。The delegate that encapsulates this method is subsequently used in a query to filter strings in an array of strings. [!code-csharp[System.Func~3#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~3/cs/Example.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Func~3#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Func~3/vb/Example.vb#5)]
